commit.message:
re PR libfortran/89020 (close(status='DELETE') does not remove file)

2019-01-26  Jerry DeLisle  <jvdelisle@gcc.gnu.org>

	PR libfortran/88020
	* io/close.c (st_close): Generate error if calls to 'remove' return
	an error.

From-SVN: r268301

files.patch:

+
+	PR libfortran/88020
+	* io/close.c (st_close): Generate error if calls to 'remove' return
+	an error.
